report_format.name: Verinice ISM
report_format.description: Information Security Management Report for Verinice import, version 3.0.0.

param.name: ISM Control Description
param.value:
Dear IS Coordinator,
A new scan has been carried out and the results are now available in Verinice. If responsible persons are linked to the asset groups, the tasks are already created.
Please check the results in a timely manner.
Best regards CIS
param.default:
Dear IS Coordinator,
A new scan has been carried out and the results are now available in Verinice. If responsible persons are linked to the asset groups, the tasks are already created.
Please check the results in a timely manner.
Best regards CIS
